name: Lemon-Glazed Blueberry Cupcakes
author: TerryWilson
summary: Glazing these blueberry cupcakes as they bake gives them an interesting crunch!
directions: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Line 24 muffin cups with paper liners
Place sugar and butter in a large bowl; beat with an electric mixer until light and fluffy
Add eggs and vanilla extract and beat until smooth
Sift 2 cups flour, baking powder, and salt together into another bowl
Beat flour mixture into the creamed butter and sugar on medium speed, alternating with milk, beating batter briefly after each addition
Divide batter among the prepared muffin cups
Bake in the preheated oven until tops look dry, about 15 minutes
Whisk powdered sugar, water, lemon juice, and zest together to make a thick but spreadable glaze
Remove cupcakes from the oven and spread 1 tablespoon glaze over each
Return cupcakes to the oven and continue baking until golden brown, 8 to 10 minutes more
Remove from the pans and cool on wire racks
